p: The antibacterial activity of the HAp samples and HAp coated with essential oil of basil and lavender samples was assessed using Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) and Staphylococcus aureus 0364 ( S. aureus 0364) and Gram-negative bacteria, Escherichia coli ATCC 25922, ( E. coli ATCC 25922) bacterial strains. The qualitative antibacterial results of the tested samples obtained by an adapted disc diffusion method are illustrated in Figure 7, and the inhibition zone diameters measured in mm are presented in Table 4.
